attributes.action: devolve as much power as possible to the citizens of the country, only using other representative where it is impractical to consult the citizens directly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Electronic communication now provides many opportunities to allow citizens to express their views directly, rather than through a 'first past the post' representative, based on arbitary geographic regions.

Where citizens views can be directly sought they should be, and work should be undertaken to expand these opportunities - this would be good for public participation in government, and for public representation.
